## Assignment Checklist

- [x] **Step 1:** Clone the Base Repository
- [x] **Step 2:** Create Environment Variable `UNIQUE_KEY`
- [x] **Step 3:** Install Required Packages
- [x] **Step 4:** Create Routes for Signup and Signin
- [x] **Step 5:** Update /movies Route
    > - [x] GET (Status: 200, Message: "GET movies")
    > - [x] POST (Status: 200, Message: "movie saved")
    > - [x] PUT (Status: 200, Message: "movie updated", JWT Auth)
    > - [x] DELETE (Status: 200, Message: "movie deleted", Basic Auth)
- [x] **Step 6:** Test Your Endpoints
    > - [x] Sign-Up Test
    > - [x] Sign-In with Valid Account
    > - [x] Sign-In with Incorrect Username
    > - [x] Sign-In with Incorrect Password
    > - [x] Test Collections Delete with Valid Basic Auth
    > - [x] Test Collections Delete with Inalid Basic Auth
    > - [x] Test Collections Put with Valid JWT Auth
    > - [x] Test Collections Put with Inalid JWT Auth
    > - [x] Get Movies
    > - [x] Create Movie
    > - [x] Update Movie with Valid JWT Auth
    > - [x] Update Movie with Invalid JWT Auth
    > - [x] Delete Movie with Valid Basic Auth
    > - [x] Delete Movie with Invalid Basic Auth
    > - [x] Patch Request
- [x] **Step 7:** Share Your Postman Project
- [x] **Step 8:** Create README.md and Submit the Assignment
